title: 09/24/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/24/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, we're joined by ESPN's Booger McFarland to preview this weekend's action in the NFL. Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio calls in and is fired up about the taunting rules. And Former NFL QB David Carr discusses how often he feels the need to defend his brother Derek.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
